title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.19 - Restricted payment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 358-2.19 - Restricted payment

State Regulations

Restricted payment means one of the methods of payment
described in Part 381 of this Title, including restricted money payment, indirect or vendor payment and protective payment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
358-2.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
